page.title: 09Clubs, Rangeworthy
page.content: { In Rangeworthy,}there are several clubs and societies: {Women's Institute.}The W.I. hold regular meetings throughout the year. At present, a group of members is working on a history of the village. {Youth Club:}The Youth Club is held every Thursday evening at the village hall. It is run by one paid leader together with volunteers. {Mothers' Union and Young Wives:}These groups are organised by members of the local Church of England congregation. {September Club:}A club for older residents. { {Rangeworthy Court Players:}The Players regularly produce plays which are performed in the village hall which is fairly large and well equipped with a stage and lights. {Football and Cricket Clubs:}These play on the parish recreation field.
